mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.`perms` FROM `sys_user_role` ur LEFT JOIN `sys_role_menu` rm ON ur.`role_id`=rm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_menu` m ON m.`id`=rm.`menu_id` WHERE ur.user_id=#{userId} AND m.`menu_type` IN ('C','F') AND m.`status`=0 AND m.`del_flag`=0
SELECT DISTINCT m.`perms` FROM `sys_menu` m WHERE m.`menu_type` IN ('C' ,'F') AND m.`status`=0 AND m.`del_flag`=0

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms,'') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM `sys_menu` m WHERE m.`menu_type` IN ('C','M') AND m.`status`=0 AND m.`del_flag`=0 ORDER BY m.parent_id,m.order_num

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms,'') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM `sys_user_role` ur LEFT JOIN `sys_role_menu` rm ON ur.`role_id`=rm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_menu` m ON m.`id`=rm.`menu_id` WHERE ur.user_id=#{userId} AND m.`menu_type` IN ('C','M') AND m.`status`=0 AND m.`del_flag`=0 ORDER BY m.parent_id,m.order_num
